name: @tonutils/tlb
description: A versatile and efficient TL-B (Type Language B) toolkit for Node.js and TypeScript, designed to generate and work with type descriptions, constructors, and functions in a type-safe manner for enhanced performance. This package simplifies the process of TL-B marshaling, allowing developers to seamlessly integrate TL-B-based data serialization and deserialization in their decentralized applications.
author: thekiba <hr@thekiba.io>, goreactdev <goreactdev12@gmail.com>
